availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Harvey Morgan (Morgan County, Ky, resident; Frankfort prisoner)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Johnson Morgan and Nancy Morgan. Resident in Morgan County, Kentucky in 1850. Convicted of manslaughter in Morgan County, Kentucky, in November 1859. Prisoner in the state penitentiary in Frankfort in 1860. Served in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a corporal.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 142A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 285.
KYR-0001-020-2242.
